Class FAQController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • controllers.FAQController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public class FAQController
extends play.mvc.Controller
    Class FAQController which contains all the handling of all the actions and function that are done for the FAQs on our portal;
